name: Recipe: Shrimp Bisque
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Shrimp Bisque.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Dish Effects</color>
Increases all party members' Healing Bonus by <color=#37ffff>15â€“20%</color> for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
<color=#ffffff>Proficiency</color>
15
<color=#ffffff>Dishes</color>

customize.name: Shrimp Bisque
customize.desc: A thick, orange-red soup. After stir-frying the spices, add the ingredients and simmer with broth until cooked. Up close, you'll catch a savory aroma laced with fiery, fragrant heat. The vibrant color of the broth whets the appetite at a glance, and it tastes even better.

customize.name: Delicious Shrimp Bisque
customize.desc: A thick, orange-red soup. Its flavor is warm and rich, the perfect spiciness of the soup blending with sweet shrimp meat and vegetables. It's as though elemental energy is surging through your body, lifting your spirits in an instant.

customize.name: Suspicious Shrimp Bisque
customize.desc: A thick, orange-red soup. A single mouthful makes your face burn hot in an instant, giving even the redness of the cooked shrimp a run for its money. After coughing and gagging for a few minutes, you finally manage to breathe again, but by then, you no longer feel like giving the dish another try...

customize.text:
Speak to Lawaia and choose the dialogue option: "An aroma of freshness?"
Then speak to Teuciztli and choose the dialogue option: "Lawaia told me you're selling fish that were caught yesterday."

customize.name: Shrimp Bisque
customize.desc: A thick, orange-red soup. After stir-frying the spices, add the ingredients and simmer with broth until cooked. Up close, you'll catch a savory aroma laced with fiery, fragrant heat. The vibrant color of the broth whets the appetite at a glance, and it tastes even better.

customize.name: Shrimp Meat
customize.desc: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Potato
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Grainfruit
customize.desc: This plant is named after the giant grains that grow along the cob.

value.text: Dialogue reward from speaking first to Lawaia and then Teuciztil
